readable.title: 3093970461_825b0cac2f
readable.content: A woman and child hug near a road . Two females are in an embrace on the street aside a beach . Two teenage girls are standing on beside the beach listening to ipods . Two young women are embracing at the side of a road and looking at an mp3 player . Two young women are hugging each other and leaning on a stone wall at the beach .
